SubString.CExoString: It is a simple chair but the grace of its lines speaks to the quality of its craftmanship.
It is a simple chair but the grace of its lines speaks to the quality of its craftmanship.
Please keep your world clean. Place your unwanted items into this barrel.
The tinker's device is usually a mess. It's advised that you do not use it unless you are properly equipped.
This furnace has been constructed to accomodate both the delicate requirements of smelting and blowing glass into vials, bottles and flasks, and the kilning of clay molds.
This furnace has been constructed to accomodate both the delicate requirements of smelting and blowing glass into vials, bottles and flasks, and the kilning of clay molds.
The tinker's toolbox is filled with many small gadgets made from springs, gears, and wire. The clutter is actually very well organized.
The tinker's toolbox is filled with many small gadgets made from springs, gears, and wire. The clutter is actually very well organized.
The tinker's device is usually a mess. It's advised that you do not use it unless you are properly equipped.
Please keep your world clean. Place your unwanted items into this barrel.
With this knife, you can aquire Scalp's from fallen dead bodie's. Certain persons would pay money to buy these trophies.
With this knife, you can aquire Scalp's from fallen dead bodie's. Certain persons would pay money to buy these trophies.
This is a standard food ration
This is a standard food ration
Used as often in the peasant's home as the dungeon's dark, these simple concoctions are common throughout Faerun.
A flask of acid that can be thrown at enemies.
Alchemist's Fire is a sticky, adhesive substance that ignites on contact with air.
This is an oil flask. You may use it to refill a lantern, or try to light it and throw at someone
This is a bedroll. You can use it by placing it on the ground.
This is a bedroll, to use it, drop it on the ground.
Use these cards as a guide when collecting components for recipes.
Use these cards as a guide when collecting components for recipes.
Use these cards as a guide when collecting components for recipes.
Use these cards as a guide when collecting components for recipes.
These curative potions are too expensive for most civilians, and are used almost exclusively by soldiers and adventurers.
With the power to staunch the flow of blood or knit a broken bone, these potions are in common use among the dangerous professions.
With the power to return people from the very brink of death, these potions do not come cheaply.
The kit is full of herbs, salves, bandages, and other useful material. It may be used to stop bleeding, cure poison or disease, and increase the recovery rate of resting patients.
